content: Embedder Creator 2022 - present A Node.js media host specialized in good looking embeds for services like Discord. No file size limits. No compression. Server-Monitoring Creator 2021 - present A dead simple Rust and Node.js system monitoring software that can observe all of your servers in one site. Equihash-Solomining Creator 2017 - present A project that specifically addresses the needs of solo cryptocurrency miners by offering a platform that allows them to manage all their mining rigs effortlessly while optimizing their efficiency. Horizen Repo Maintainer, DevOps 2016-2017 A fork of Zcash with better support for sidechains and stronger connection protocols like mandatory TLS usage.

title: Projects
